description: Enjoy this easy-to-make roast lamb with vegetables recipe with family and friends. Paired with a rocket pesto, takes this dish to the next level.
keywords: Roast lamb,Roast,Seafood free,Holidays & entertaining,Fresh ingredients,Gluten free,Lamb,Egg free,Winter,Sesame free,Potato,Parsnip,Wheat free,Sweet potato,Easter
name: Roast lamb with vegetables and rocket pesto Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 garlic clove, sliced (and extra 1 for rocket pesto)
2 tbs olive oil (extra 1/3 cup olive oil for rocket pesto)
2 lemons, 1 sliced (and extra 1 for rocket pesto)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C. Using a sharp knife, make cuts in the surface of the lamb and insert garlic. Place lamb into a roasting dish, drizzle with half the oil, and season with salt and pepper.
Place meat into the oven and cook for 15 minutes. Reduce the heat to 200°C and cook the lamb for a further 15 minutes.

Add vegetables to a second roasting pan. Drizzle with remaining oil. Season. Place into the oven with the lamb. Add lemon and rosemary to the lamb. Roast for a further 45 minutes or until cooked to your liking. Remove lamb from the oven, cover with foil and rest for 15 minutes before carving.

Meanwhile, process rocket, pistachios, parmesan, garlic and lemon zest in a food processor until roughly chopped. Add the oil and process until finely chopped. Transfer to a serving bowl and cover with plastic. Set aside.
Remove lemon slices. Carve lamb into slices and serve with roast vegetables and a generous dollop of the pesto.
